attributes.action: Lack of transport in rural communities
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition to help us fight against the lack of transport in rural areas/communities.  Did you know that in rural Mid Devon alone, the number of bus routes have been more than halved in the last eighteen months?  Lots of people have had to stop going to sport clubs or even major jobs because of the lack of buses.  If there were more buses/trains then there would be far less emissions coming from cars and would therefore help restore the countryside's natural beauty.
Thank You.

rejection.details: What are you calling on national Government to do?  You may wish to resubmit your petition with a clear request for action from central Government (bearing in mind that provision of bus services is a matter for bus companies and local authorities).
